conversations.content: Please note that this story contains spoilers for Chapter 20 of the main campaign.
Nobody's gonna mess up our freedom...
More rain today? Tch! What I wouldn't give for just a little bit'a sun.
Howzabout we find a nice village to hit and take our mind off'a it! Ya know? Loot, kill, pillage—all the classics!
Huh? How'd these kids get in here?
Hey, misters. Let us shelter from the rain with you, 'kay?
And while we're at it, we can play house together!
＂Hey! I saw you with the man next door, honey! I was right here and you didn't care at all!＂
＂Well, YOU'VE been messing around with the florist's daughter, darling, so maybe take care of your own house first!＂
＂Oh, I have HAD it! We are DONE! I'm gonna kill you and then die!＂
＂Ha! Not if I do it to you first!＂
Urgh...
Hey, Oto? I think that one can still talk.
Goodness! How strange that a puppet like him can talk at all.
There, that takes care of it. I can't believe we didn't kill that miserable bit player in one strike. Embaaaaarrassing!
You think this is another result of our losing the power of the mask?
Ever since the fight at the Sacred Tree, we haven't been able to summon a Feral Shroud or enter beast form—and who knows what's up with the other Agitos?
Yeah, maybe they all got squished when the Sacred Tree collapsed. But what does it even matter, right, Oto?
Right, Aya. Whatever happens, nothing changes the correctness of our freedom. But in more important news, what are we going to play after the rain stops?
What else? We're going to tear apart those unsightly puppets that have mistaken ideas about freedom!
You mean playing with Laxi and them again? Noooo! I'm tiiiired of that!
What are you talking about? They need to be taught whose freedom is right!
Yeah, but it's soooo boring playing with the same playmates over and over again.
You're not annoyed that they deny our freedom?
Sure I am! But staying obsessed with them isn't freedom—it's basically just getting tied down by the other person.
Which is why I want to find something else to play!
No! That's unsightly. It's giving up like a big fat losing loser.
A loser, you say?
Not paying them back even though they denied us is the kind of thing a mindless puppet would do.
Yeah, I feel like getting all caught up in revenge is more the puppet thing.
Are you trying to tell me I'm MISTAKEN?!
I sure am. Honestly, it's kinda sad.
ME?! SAD?! HOW VERY DARE YOU!
EXCUSE YOU?!
You're a coward, Oto! A wimp! A weakling! A whiny little baby! And I'm leaving you!
You're a birdbrain, Aya! A dummy! A know-nothing blockhead!
*pant* *pant*
...Hey. The rain stopped.
It sure did. And now I'm outta here.
I don't feel like breathing the same air as someone so tedious as you.
Hmph. And I wouldn't even let a loser like you do it if you wanted to!
Sheesh. Oto's totally lost her marbles.
(But this is the first time we've ever had a fight in our entire life...)
(We've always gotten along. Our opinions have never diverged even a tiny bit.)
(But since the fight at the Sacred Tree, things have been weird. It's like something changed between the two of us.)
What, is Oto back already? After all that pompous junk she said?
Wait. That's not Oto! It's...!
Scanning. No life signs detected. ▷Don't let your guard down, Laxi. This is the lair of violent bandits!◁
(Ha! It's Laxi! Did she come here to kill the dumb bandits that were here?)
(Well, this saves me the trouble of having to track 'em down. I'm going to kill her SUPER dead this time!)
Forget Aya. From now on I'm gonna play alone.
Still, this village is weird. It's like there's a strange mana floating around.
Oh, are you people from this village? Come be my puppets!
Grraaagh!
Now see here! What's all this about?!
Geez, angry much? Those people were less like people and more like beasts.
Hey now! You didn't lose your senses even though you're in the middle of the miasma? How veeeery interesting.
Who are you?
Me? I'm Lilith. Say, do you like candy?
I see damage to the walls and furniture. ▷You think there was a fight here? Oh, wait! Look over there!◁
(Laxi hasn't noticed me. In that case...)
▷Yeah, it's definitely one of the thieves mentioned in the wanted notice.◁
The wounds look familiar. Referencing past data. Deducing attacker... ▷Don't tell me the folks who did this were...◁
Guess whoooo?!
▷Ayaha! Hrk!◁ I failed to detect her attack!
Been a long time, Laxi! Sadly, it's also farewell, because I'm about to pull your dumb head right off your dumb body!
Sustaining damage to neck components! ▷This is bad! We can't shake her!◁
Kya ha ha ha! You're gonna be torn to ugly little SHREDS!
Hraaaah!
Target acquired! FIRE!
Hrk!
It's Eirene and Finni. ▷And just in time!◁
We were conducting a sweep of the hideout when we picked up a powerful enemy signature.
And then we came rushin' in here just in time to save your booties!
So it wasn't just Laxi in this place, eh? I assume you two are androids as well?
You're one of those twins from Agito. Where is your other half?
We may be of different type and affiliation, but we've heard about the things you've done to our fellow androids. Now it's payback time!
Kya ha ha! Then stop me if you can! I'll rip all your stupid heads off at once!
▷Let's go, Laxi.◁ Mode shift, EDEN!
Simulation complete. Calculated pattern for pincer attack. Commencing combat.
Green across the board! Fightin' time!
Get down and show me some ugly groveling, puppets! KYA HA HA HA!
Oooo, this candy is yummy! What's the flavor?
Blood-soaked strawberry! I also have black-and-blueberry.
Hey, so have you really not been showered in holy water, Otoha?
I don't know about any of that stuff.
But if the miasma isn't making you cuckoo, your body must be special in some way.
Or maybe it couldn't take your sense because you don't have any! Ah ha ha! That'd be absolutely BANANAS!
Humans are basically the same as bugs, but I dig folks like you who are totally nuts.
And I like folks like you. You're so emotionally unstable, but your way of thinking is WONDERFUL!
Yep! This world is my toy box and everything exists to entertain me.
We're free to play however I like. No matter how much we destroy our toys, it should be allowed because we're free.
There's something wrong with the adults who scold us for just breaking a toy. We have to make them understand.
Okay, so how would you do that, exactly?
I'll tear off their limbs so they can't cross me again. Then I'll rend their hearts by destroying what's dear to them so they can't even get angry anymore.
Oh, I like you. I like you a LOT.
Say, Otoha? You want to play with me?
I've been running riot solo lately, and it's got me stuck in a rut.
Well, I was kinda thinking I'd play on my own for a while, buuuut...
So you don't want to play with me? Do you maybe like being alone?
Nah, I'll play with you. At least you're not a boring loser like Ayaha.
Yeah, baby! We got this!
Damn it! I should be able to beat them even without the power of the mask!
The enemy has taken heavy damage. Victory is at hand. ▷This will end it!◁
It's...so...unsightly...
Enemy neutralized. Combat ended. ▷Let's restrain her while we can.◁
Uh, wouldn't it be better to...ya know? Finish her off?
Otoha isn't here. ▷We need to ask her some things, including where the other Agitos are.◁
Yeah, but this lady ain't exactly cooperative. You really think she'll just tell you?
About that, perhaps you'll be good enough to let me analyze her?
Commencing mana scan... Analyzing biometric data... Yes, I see.
▷Did you learn something?◁
Previous combat data revealed that their twin coordinated attacks had a very high synchronization rate for humans, which raised some questions for me.
Agreed. Despite a lack of verbal communication, they managed to attack with perfect timing.
And now we know why: Their horns are sensory organs which emit mana.
They use them to match each other's mana wavelengths and share thoughts and feelings instantaneously.
So they were syncing their consciousness via telepathy? That's a pretty amazing skill for a pair of humans.
It sounds similar to the sending and receiving of remote commands between androids.
Yes, the mechanism is almost the same. So if we apply that and tune our frequencies to the mana emitted from the horns...
We could access the twins' consciousness!
They're not androids, though, so I can't say for certain it'll work.
Analyzing Eirene's proposal... Conclusion: it is theoretically possible. ▷In which case, we can get the info we need without trying to force Ayaha to talk!◁
It's worth a try. But who's gonna do it?
If we're essentially accessing the heart of a human, it makes sense for Laxi to do it, given she knows much of the heart.
▷Yeah, leave it to us!◁ All right. We'll try.
Tuning mana wavelength. Interference ratio 50, 70, 90... Alignment complete. Accessing subject's consciousness...
Confirming influx of data to visual circuit. Subject's consciousness accessed. ▷What are we looking at here?◁
Likely an image created from accumulated past data in Ayaha's consciousness. ▷So it's her memories, basically.◁
Demons! The twin demons have appeared!
Those girls from the island nation? I thought they'd been driven off to the mountains!
They're wearing strange masks and burning houses one after the—AAAAUGH!!
Hey, let's play tag!
We'll be it, so you people run away. Kya ha ha ha!
And if we catch you, you'll go through some unsightly stuff—just like all of you did to us! Kyaaa ha ha ha ha!
Y-you're back...
Been a while, huh? Also, you suuuure made us put up with a lot of crap.
＂Don't go out.＂ ＂Don't play with anyone.＂ ＂Behave yourselves.＂ ＂Do what I say.＂ ＂Don't go around wherever you want.＂
All we ever got from you were toy dolls. You did nothing else for us.
Having to follow your orders was REALLY tedious and boring.
You two have had supernatural power since birth. What you see as play could very well destroy everything.
As such, I hid you from society in an effort to prevent everything around you from coming to harm. But this is you two we're talking about, so...
So we broke your word and played outside, and then we broke that old mercenary who used to come by and play with us.
We weren't TRYING to break him! We just heard he was strong and hit him with all we had. Not our fault he was actually super fragile.
Then you should understand why the two of you were banished from the village. This resentment of yours is unjustifiable.
Yeah, we thought we did something bad. We disobeyed your command, after all.
That's why we thought it made sense that you and the villagers chased us into the mountains.
It was our fault that we were hungry. It was our fault our clothes were dirty. It was all our fault. All of it.
But then he taught us that was wrong.
He?
He told us that people with power could use it to gain their freedom.
We have power, which means we have freedom. So what we do is up to us.
We won't be bound by anyone else's decisions. We'll play how we like and not let anyone ever yell at us again.
Our freedom won't be interfered with. And now we're going to play with the ones who tried to take our freedom away.
—Kyaaaa ha ha ha! —Eh heh heh heh!
This is no freedom. True freedom is made by coming to an understanding with others.
You two are beasts who can't be reasoned with, and I should have killed you when I had the chance!
What's this puppet babbling about?
Trying to do the whole ＂parent＂ thing too late in the game and lecture us, I guess. How tedious.
Begone from our sight.
Guwaaargh! Aya... Oto...
I'm the only one who can call her Oto. Isn't that right, Oto?
That's right, Aya. There's no one else. Since the moment we were born, I've had a connection with no one but you.
Uninhibited conflagration... Just as I expected, you're making full use of the mask's power.
Hey, it's that guy!
Hey, our freedom is the most right, right?
The strong decide what is right. If you believe your freedom is right, use your power to prove this is the case.
Yeah! If anyone denies our freedom, we'll teach 'em how wrong they are!
And don't forget my request. Now that you're wearing the masks, you two are rebels against this world.
Oh, we'll help with that. We wanna destroy this stifling world as bad as you do!
We are wings. Paired, free, soaring over all. We are Agito!
This is how they ended up joining Agito. ▷For better or worse, these kids are about as pure and genuine as you get.◁
Mascula, we need to prioritize gathering information. We'll search her memories of the Sacred Tree and find out what became of the other Agito members.
Imagery of defeated Agitos located. This seems to be a memory that took place after the fight at the Sacred Tree.
▷Speaking of that, I've been wondering about something. When we fought them here, they couldn't speak...◁
After losing to you, they swore revenge and sought to amplify the power of the masks they had been given.
They bolstered their fighting instincts to the very limits of their control, and as part of that process limited even their ability to communicate.
▷But just a while ago, Ayaha was communicating normally. So what's the deal with that?◁
Ayaha said she lost the mask's power, which likely stifled her own ability.
▷I wonder if because she lost her power, she was freed from that particular effect. ...Oh!◁
▷The Agito members were caught up in the Sacred Tree's collapse!◁ Target lost. I can't confirm if they're alive or dead.
▷No, wait. I see a figure in the smoke. Is that...?◁
Nobody's gonna mess up our freedom.
▷Did you see that, Laxi?◁ The power of their mask...
Forcible mana interference confirmed! ▷What the—?!◁
I'm gonna crush you between my teeth! Aaaah ha ha ha ha!
I HATE YOU!
Shortly before Laxi connected to Ayaha's consciousness...
I'll take this tough-looking fella here.
And I'll pick this sturdy young guy.
Great! Now let's watch our berserk humans battle to the death. Aaaand...FIGHT!
GYAAAAGH!
Ngaaahhhh!
Yeah, that's it! Tear him apart!
Hey, don't go LOSING, tough guy! ...Tch! He's gonna get shredded at this rate.
GRAAAAARGH!
Yaaaay! I win again!
Not fair! You used miasma to make him go even more berserk.
Don't go making false accusations like that unless you have proof, girlie!
Grrr...
Okay then, time for another match! This time, we'll have the old man and his grandkid fight.
Pass.
Whaat? You're gonna stop playing? Why?
Only ever playing with you is boring. I'm just going to play by myself.
Gonna leave, huh? Say, did you know that demons are veeery greedy?
Hey, what are you doing?!
Once I've gotten my hands on a toy, I neeever let it go!
So if you won't play with me, I'll just play with you!
You're crazy if you think I'm a toy!
I'm going to make YOU my puppet!
*pant* *pant* This...is so boring!
That was actually fairly fun, given that you're a human. But I'm tired of it now.
Now let me hear the screams of your final moments! Let me hear the ugly screams of a loooooser!
Hrk!
You're the one who's gonna be making ugly screams!
Bwuh? What the hey?!
Don't you touch her.
Aya! ...Wait, and a buncha other folks?
What are all of you doing with Aya?
Temporary truce. ▷We're not your enemy right now.◁
...So you're saying one of the twins is engaged in a fight with a demon?
Otoha's thoughts came to us while we were connected to Ayaha. ▷It was likely an unconsciously emitted signal of her desire for rescue.◁
So we're gonna leave her to die, right? Riiiiight?
I am worried about the damage that could be caused by the demon's miasma. Whether we choose to rescue Otoha or no, we need to go there right away.
▷Yes, but where do we go? Her thoughts didn't get into that much detail.◁
...Let me go.
Oh, she's awake. Yippee.
I always know where Oto is. So if you want to beat this demon or whatever it is, you just need to follow me.
It is true your telepathic abilities could perceive the location of your other half. However...
However, there's no way in heck we're gonna trust you! You're probably just pretending to help so we let our guards down or whatever.
I would NEVER do that!!
We two are one! We might have fought, but Oto is irreplaceable—another me!
I would never just abandon her, so let me go find her already!
▷What do we think?◁ I detect no indicators of lying in her biosigns.
As Ayaha also views the demon as an enemy, it would be more efficient to cooperate and deal with our common foe.
▷All right. We're going to believe you. Take us to the demon.◁
Commencing operation. While Finni goes to collect holy water, Laxi and I will quell the berserk villagers.
▷Let's leave Lilith to Ayaha.◁ After we finish quelling the berserk people, we'll go back and support her.
We don't need YOUR support. When the two of us are together, a demon is nothing. Isn't that right, Oto?
Heck yeah, Aya! Two bodies, one heart. We are the wings that soar to freedom!
And no one can stop our flight!
You little trash babies are SORELY underestimating me here!
Ah ha ha! Too bad, you missed!
Where'd all that energy of yours go? Eh heh heh!
Damn! Their coordinated attack is unstoppable! There's no way I can handle that!
...Nah, just kidding. Heeey, you guys love candy, right?
What the heck?!
We can't break it!
▷It's that candy attack!◁
Now shatter like candy between my teeth! Aah ha ha ha ha!
Gyaaaaaaa!
Now shatter like candy between my teeth! Aah ha ha ha ha!
Gyaaaaaaa!
It's pitch-black, Oto.
I can't see anything, Aya.
Are we really gonna die in this unsightly way?
Definitely looks like it. How boring...
How absolutely hopeless.
Hey, I know that voice!
First you're saved by people who were your enemies, and now you're in this scrape?
Did you get infected with weakness in the short time we've been apart? Bwa ha ha!
Ciella! Volk!
How feeble of you to be killed by something such as this. You are weak, and weakness must be culled.
You are not worthy to meet my fallen king.
And Kai Yan and Tartarus!
Though you always ridicule others for it, you are actually the weaklings who are unsightly and boring.
Nedrick will likely be ashamed that he ever entrusted you with masks.
It is the peak of feeble fecklessness to be so resigned while having power.
Or will the two of you continue to struggle hopelessly?
They're running their mouths, but they're all just voices in our heads.
But I'm sure they'd say the same thing if they could see us the way we are...
Which makes me FURIOUS!
Exactly! Plus, I won't be satisfied unless we get her back for this.
We're rebels against the world— the ones who will awaken it.
Our rebellion will never end until we've chewed up this world. That's why...
AWAKEN, AGITO!
Hrk! We have the disadvantage in this situation.
Damage at 45 percent! ▷We're in trouble!◁
Now that I'm done with the twins, I'll kill you all next! Oh, but quick question: Do you prefer PAIN or SUFFERING?
Huh? What's this? A blue butterfly?
I'm detecting high-density mana coming from the butterfly. ▷Could that be...?!◁
Okay, what the heck is this?!
Just our way of saying thanks for the candy.
You!
We are Agito, the twin wings that soar to freedom, and none can interfere with it!
How can they transform into this beast without the power of the mask?!
▷Because we were wrong. The power of the mask stayed with them even after the battle at the Sacred Tree.◁
I surmise their bodies were trying to adapt to the amplified power of the masks, which left them temporarily unable to use their power.
▷But now they've adapted to the amplified power, which means their abilities will be even stronger!◁
Now let's play together! Let's play until you're all in PIECES!
What, you want me to act all impressed just 'cause you fused? Ha! Not likely! I'll just let the berserk humans handle the androids here...
While I kill you damn kids!
That it? How unsightly! Try harder.
(The little brats really have powered up... But I ain't done yet!)
Oh, come on! Candy AGAIN?!
Can't do a daaaarn thing if you can't move, can ya? Now get ready to get dyin'!
According to past combat data, the candy is strong against interior impact, but can be destroyed from the outside.
Wait, the androids are interfering now?! What happened to the berserk humans?!
Changing cartridge. Charging holy water. Target locked...FIRE!
Sorry for being so late, but we've come with holy water from the Halidom! Leave the purification of the townsfolk to us!
You WRETCHES!
Analyzing... If we damage both wings of Lilith's staff, we can weaken her.
Then we'll pluck those wings right off. Now show us the unsightly sight of you groveling, you boring demon!
Commencing attack. ▷Yeah, let's go!◁
Haaaaah!
The wings... Oh, you jerks can NOT do this to me! No way!
▷Is this some kind of miasma smokescreen?!◁
I'm gonna tear every last one of you to pieces—especially you rotten little twins! So you better be ready, because I'm comin' back LOADED FOR BEAR!
▷Hrk! She escaped!◁
We can't play anymore? BOOO-RING.
The berserk villagers have been purified.
I'd like to say that this settles things, but I don't think it does.
With our mutual enemy gone, there is no longer any need for us to be cooperating with those two.
So are we going to play or what? I mean, we don't care. Whatever.
Yeah, I'm not done having fun, so we're gonna play even if you tell us to stop.
▷Actually, I have a request. From now on, do you think you two can maybe stop brutally murdering people and burning things to the ground?◁
What are you getting at, man?
There's no way these two loonies would ever agree to that.
It's true their spirits are immature and cruel, and they go too far in search of their own desires. But...
▷But they can still think of each other, which means they have hearts that work in there somewhere.◁
▷And if they have hearts, they ought to understand that freedom is something shared with everyone, not owned by just the two of them.◁
You two are beasts who can't be reasoned with, and I should have killed you when I had the chance!
Laxi...
This isn't a command. Just a request. ▷I'm sure you two are capable of learning a different kind of freedom than you've enjoyed up until now.◁
This is weird, Oto.
Yeah, it's weird, Aya.
—Eh heh heh heh! —Kyaaaa ha ha ha!
▷So does that mean...?◁
Our freedom is correct, which means we don't need a different one.
Being able to play with and bust whatever we want IS our freedom, and no one else can decide that for us.
But I do kinda like the idea of you asking us for something, so we'll listen to half of your request.
Half?
For a little while at least, the only ones we'll destroy will be people who've attacked us.
We're never going to let Lilith off the hook for making a fool of us—and since she's got some fellow demons, we'll just destroy all of 'em together!
But then once all the demons are gone, it'll be your turn, Laxi. We'll tear you and every one of your friends at that castle into teeny tiny pieces.
You can try, chumps!
No use getting mad about it. We made up our minds, so that's what we're gonna do.
Also, it was sorta interesting fighting with all of you, so it might be nice to play like we're friends every once in a while.
Uh oh. It's gotten pretty dark. Time for us to go, Oto.
You're right, Aya. Bye-bye, puppets!
No, wait!
Their signal is lost, almost as if it is using some kind of stealth functionality. Perhaps this is part of the mask's amplified power.
▷I guess there's no way to come to an understanding with them, huh?◁
That is a difficult question. However, human beings are always changing, so they should be no exception.
Oh my gosh, did you hear the news? We've got GHOSTS at the Halidom!
Food keeps disappearing from tables...
And people keep hearing the sounds of laughter and footsteps...
And when you go out on adventures, it feels like someone is joining you. It's just like an actual horror story!
Hey, I'm an adult, so I'm not even a little scared.
All right, it's bedtime for good little girls and boys. If you're naughty and stay up late, I'm gonna gobble you up!
EEEEK! RUN AWAAAAY!
Honestly, those kids are... Wait, huh? Who were those other faces there?
Hey. You. Out doing night patrol? Isn't that BORING?
Wait, it's a rule? Ugh. Being tied up by things like that is stifling, which is why...
WE'RE GONNA TEACH YOU FREEDOM!
